entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries over northeastern sections early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
